name: wk1-code-challenge
description: First,this is a program that inputs students marks which its task is to generate students grades running from 0 - 100.Secondly,this program takes as input the speed of a car,in this case being a speed detector,where the condition is if the speed is less than 70km/h,it should print "OK".Otherwise if the speed is above the limit(70km/h),it should give the driver one demerit point and print the total number of demerit points. Lastly,the program acts as a net salary calculator where its majot task is to calculate an individual net salary by getting the inputs of basic salary and benefits
author: Jessica Gichuru Muthoni
